document.docAuthor: Gadallah, Neveen S., Ghahari, Hassan, Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier & Fischer, Maximilian
document.masterDocTitle: Updated checklist of Iranian Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Updated checklist of Iranian Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Iran .
Kermanshah (Ghahari and Fischer 2012 ).

Host records. In Finland , it is reported from several species of Agromyzidae ( Diptera ):
Agromyza abiens Zetterstedt, 1848
,
A. alnibetulae Hendel, 1931
on
Alnus incana
(L.),
A. anthracina Meigen, 1830
,
A. arunci Hering, 1957
on
Aruncus vulgaris Raf.
,
A. nigripes Meigen, 1830
on
Agrotis canina
L.,
A. reptans Fallen, 1823
,
A. urticae Nowakowski, 1924
on
Urtica dioica
L.,
Ceradontha pygmaea (Meigen, 1830 )
on
Dactylis glomerata
L.,
Liriomyza amoena (Meigen, 1830 )
,
L. eupatorii (Kaltenbach, 1873 )
on
Galeopsis tetrahit
L.,
Phytomyza actaea Hendel, 1922
on
Actaea spicata
L.,
Ph . angelicastri
Hering, 1932
on
Anthriscus sylvestris
(L.),
Ph . heracleana
Hering, 1937
on
Peucedanum ostruthium
(L.),
Rubiomyza hendeliana Hering, 1926
on
Lonicera periclymenium
L. (
Fischer and Koponen 1999
). According to
Žikić et al . ( 2013 b)
:
Agromyza abiens Zetterstedt, 1848
,
A. alnibetulae Hendel, 1931
;
A. anthracina Meigen, 1830
;
A. arunci Hering, 1957
,
A. nigripes Meigen, 1830
;
A. pseudoreptans Nowakowski, 1967
;
A. reptans Fallen, 1823
;
Amauromyza labiatarum (Hendel, 1920 )
,
Aulagromyza hendeliana (Hering, 1926 )
,
Cerodontha pygmaea (Meigen, 1830 )
,
Chromatomyia periclymeni
(de Meijere, 1924 ),
Liriomyza amoena (Meigen, 1830 )
,
L. eupatorii (Kaltenbach, 1873 )
,
Phytomyza actaeae Hendel, 1922
,
Ph . angelicastri
Hering, 1932
,
Ph . chaerophylli
Kaltenbach, 1856
,
Ph . heracleana
Hering, 1937
( Diptera : Agromyzidae ).
